info.Name: Garage Sale Workshop
info.Description: Description: In this workshop, you shall be trained for the garage sales

info.Name: Environmental Workshop
info.Description: Description: In this workshop, you shall be trained on how to plant trees and take care of them.

info.Name: Teaching Workshop
info.Description: Description: In this workshop, we shall go over basics of teaching so that it's easy to help out with the children and to teach them

info.Name: Child Wealth Fundraiser
info.Description: Description: This is a fundraiser organized for the purpose of raising funds to send kids to school

info.Name: Health Care Go Fund Me
info.Description: Description: This fundraiser will be held for the sole purpose of raising funds to send the less needy to hospitals

info.Name: Pup Day
info.Description: Description: This Fundraiser will be for the sole purpose of raising funds to provide for the shelter animals

info2.Name: Community Service
info2.Description: Description: This activity will be all about cleaning the environment

info2.Name: BingBong Cleanup
info2.Description: Description: Help us clean the main conference room after their bing bong elderly night event

info2.Name: Pick a plastic Day
info2.Description: Description: This activity will be all about cleaning recycling
